articles.author: Isaac Schultz
articles.title: A Supercomputer Just Created the Largest Universe Simulation Ever
articles.description: The Frontier supercomputer's calculations provide a new foundation for simulating the universe's conventional physics, but also the enigmatic behaviors and properties of dark matter.
articles.content:
Last month, a team of researchers put the then-fastest supercomputer in the world to work on a rather large quandary: the nature of the universe’s atomic and dark matter.
The supercomputer is called… [+3945 chars]
